name: Sam's Walk
description:
This is a little test game that I made with tic80.

Tic80 is a great way to make retro games, with lua coding. this was made with Tic80's pixel art editor tool. It's good. 

Make sure to Follow me on my Twitter, Facebook and my itch.io! It helps me alot and makes me make even more games!
Have a good day! Make sure to share your thoughts on my stuff (games etc), by rating it and writing a comment to help me improve my work, so that I can become more successful. I use Aseprite for my pixel art. I usually do 16 by 16 pixels when I do my pixelated tilesets. Aseprite's a great way to make tilesets, characters or sprites, or just pixel art in any form.

Follow my Facebook page!:    (https://www.facebook.com/GonsoGames-775323316155965/?modal=admin_todo_tour)

Follow my Twitter!: (https://twitter.com/GonsoGames)
